settings.heading: Build Your Recovery Routine
settings.subheading: The most valuable way to experience Breathe—4-16 monthly Tech-Remedy Credits, unlimited ice baths, guest passes, and member-only pricing. Credits rollover month-to-month.

settings.heading: Why Membership?
settings.text:
Membership at Breathe Wellness Sanctuary gives you the most rewarding way to build your recovery routine. While you don't need to be a member to book our experiences, members unlock unmatched value: 4-16 monthly Tech-Remedy Credits, unlimited ice baths, guest passes, and member-only pricing.

With thoughtfully limited memberships per location, you'll enjoy an inclusive community while experiencing the exclusivity, savings, and consistency that make the Breathe lifestyle easier to sustain. Credits rollover month-to-month, so you never lose value.

settings.heading: Choose Your Membership Tier
settings.subheading: Select the tier that matches your recovery goals. Upgrade, downgrade, or pause anytime after your 3-month initial commitment.

settings.question: Can I use all of my Tech-Remedy Credits in one day?
settings.answer: Yes, you're welcome to use multiple Credits in a single day. Just let us know and we'll help you create the ideal lineup based on your recovery goals—whether you want to accelerate recovery, reduce inflammation, or optimize performance.

settings.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my membership tier later on?
settings.answer: Absolutely. After your 3-month commitment, you can shift between tiers at any time. Just reach out to your club concierge and we'll make it smooth.

settings.question: How long do my rollover Credits last?
settings.answer: Rollover Credits are retained month-to-month as long as your membership remains active. If you cancel or pause, any unused Credits will expire at the end of your membership period.

settings.question: Do memberships auto-renew?
settings.answer: Yes, memberships renew monthly after your 3-month minimum. You can cancel, pause, or change tiers any time after that period with just a quick email to our team.
